CustomField.formula: IF(animalos__Days_in_Status__c < 10, IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/green.png","GREEN", 30, -1), IF(animalos__Days_in_Status__c < 25, IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/yellow.png","YELLOW", 30, -1), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png","RED", 30, -1) ) )
CustomField.label: Days in Status Tracking
